#summary Contents of the DFTEditor folder.

== Overview ==

Displays the output of "out.txt" created by a.exe<br>
See *main.c* in [DFTFolder DFTFolder] for format of 'out.txt'<br>
Creates a binary clone "out.mono5ms" from out.txt if this file does not already exist.<br>
Binary file only takes a few seconds to load (out.txt takes at least a minute)<br>

== Building ==

From DOS Prompt:<br>
>*c*<br>
c.bat deletes existing class files and runs ANT<br>
Output: DFTEditor.jar<br>

== Running ==
From DOS Prompt:<br>
>*r*<br>
(r.bat is simply "java -jar DFTEditor.java")

== Files ==

_Main Class:_<br>
*DFTEditor.java*: Loads out.txt, initializes main data structures, creates GUI components<br>
<br>
_MVC Classes:_<br>
*DFTController.java*: Handles mouse events, menu events<br>
*DFTView*: Handles matrix display of file data<br>
*DFTModel.java*: Defines common data structures<br>
<br>
_Main Helper Class_<br>
*DFTUtils.java*: Contains helper functions used by multiple classes<br>
<br>
_Classes with specific functions_<br>
*AudioPlayer.java*: Plays PCM data at run time<br>
*CreateWavelets.java*: Mirrors wavelet generation code in main.c<br>
*FileTools.java:* Displays open/save prompts<br>
*LogLinear.java*: Code for frequency domain to PCM conversion<br>
<br>
